description: Oriental teaware adds a touch of class to tea appreciation, perfect for the tea aficionado. Alternatively, use it as a platform to display your exquisite tea set.

name: Chinese Yixing Set
description: Unglazed ceramic teapots absorb the tea's aroma with each brew, enhancing the following experience with each usage. A common practice is to use each pot for only a particular type of tea.
nice_flowery_sentence: Yixing teapots were first created in Jiangsu province, and quickly became coveted amongst Chinese intellectuals in the the 16th century. Return to the oriental roots of tea and embrace the rich history each cup holds.

name: Matcha Powder
meta_title: Matcha Green Tea | Japanese Powder Tea
meta_description: A fine powdered green tea traditionally used in Japanese tea drinking ceremonies, its smooth and velvety texture is perfect on its own or paired with milk to create that creamy latte brew
ingredients: Green tea ground into a fine powder.
nice_flowery_sentence:
Grown in the shade for that extra boost in chlorophyll levels, Matcha is the only tea where the entire leave is consumed. A fine powdered green tea traditionally used in Japanese tea drinking ceremonies, its smooth and velvety texture is perfect on its own or paired with milk to create that creamy latte brew

Health benefits include: High in antioxidants, dietary fibre and chlorophyll
